name: Pioneering the visual web. NYSE: PINS Pinterest
about:
Exit: NYSE | PINS
Partner: Rick Heitzmann
Location: San Francisco, CA

Rick Heitzmann met Pinterest Founder Ben Silbermann at an NYU demo day, and saw something special — leading him to write the first institutional check into what would become one of the most important companies of the last 20 years.

Pinterest is the leader in visual search and discovery. It is one of the fastest-growing consumer internet sites in history, counting over 400 million current users, who have collectively created over 5 billion Pinterest boards.

Pinterest went public in 2019, reaching a $13 billion valuation on the day of its IPO, and doubling that valuation to over $26 billion in the time since.

name: Discord
about: Imagine a place where you can belong to a school club, a gaming group, or a worldwide art community. Where just you and a handful of friends can spend time together. A place that makes it easy to talk every day and hang out more often.

name: Synthesia
about:
Partner: Matt Turck
Location: London / New York / EU / Distributed

Synthesia is the world’s leading enterprise AI video communications platform. More than 60,000 businesses, including over 60% of the Fortune 100, use it to communicate efficiently and share knowledge at scale using AI avatars. Founded in 2017, Synthesia is headquartered in London and makes video creation, collaboration and sharing easy for everyone.

name: Justworks
about: Justworks takes the busyness out of growing a business and alleviates the unknown. They’ve combined a simple platform and exceptional 24/7 customer service with the power of a PEO, so all teams have more time to focus on what matters. Get access to corporate-level benefits, seamless payroll, HR tools, and compliance support—all in one place.

name: NASDAQ: ABNB Airbnb
about:
Partner: Rick Heitzmann
Location: San Francisco, CA

Airbnb is where people go to explore the world and, since inception, has grown to 4 million Hosts and welcomed more than 1 billion Guests.

In 2020, Airbnb went public on the NASDAQ, reaching a valuation of $47 billion, making it the largest IPO of the year.

name: Acquired by Adobe Frame.io
about:
FirstMark Partner: Amish Jani
Location: New York, NY

Frame.io is video Collaboration for the 21st Century. Privately upload, review, and share video with your entire team, anywhere in the world. Frame.io was acquired by Adobe in 2021.

name: Dataiku
about:
Dataiku is a data science collaboration layer, enabling all components (data repositories, algorithms, models) and people (data scientists, data analysts, data engineers) to work together, at scale.

In this episode, Matt Turck sits down with Florian Douetteau, Cofounder and CEO of Dataiku, a global category leader in enterprise AI and a fixture on the Forbes Cloud 100 list and in the Gartner Leader Quadrant. Florian shares his journey from being a Parisian student fascinated by functional programming to leading a global enterprise software company. They discuss how Dataiku bridges the gap between technical and business teams to democratize AI in the enterprise, the challenges of selling to enterprise clients, and how Dataiku acts as an orchestration layer for Generative AI, helping businesses manage complex data processes and control AI, so they can build more with AI.

name: NASDAQ: UPWK Upwork
about:
FirstMark Partner: Rick Heitzmann
Location: San Francisco, CA
CEO: Hayden Brown

Upwork is the world’s work marketplace that connects businesses with independent talent from across the globe. Upwork went public in 2018 (NASDAQ: UPWK).

name: NASDAQ: DKNG DraftKings
about: DraftKings is the leading destination for online fantasy sports, where users compete against each other to win cash prizes. DraftKings went public in 2020 (NASDAQ: DKNG).

name: Making commerce better for everyone NASDAQ: SHOP Shopify
about:
Shopify creates the best commerce tools for anyone, anywhere, to start and grow a business.

Amish partnered with Shopify at the Series A in 2010, when the company was at its earliest stages and when ecommerce was still in its nascency. He joined the Board and worked closely with the team as it rapidly scaled and “armed the Rebels.”

Shopify went public in 2015 on the New York Stock Exchange at a $1.3 billion valuation — a number which has since grown to over $100 billion, as it has become the platform on which nearly 2 million merchants globally build and run their businesses.

name: ActionIQ Acquired by Uniphore
about: ActionIQ is the leading marketing activation platform, solving the biggest problem marketers face: the flow and scale of data, analytics, and campaigns.

name: Ada
about:
FirstMark Partner: Matt Turck
Location: Toronto, CA

Ada is the world’s leading customer service automation company. Built for the digitally transforming enterprise, Ada’s AI-powered customer service automation platform helps companies effortlessly resolve their customer inquiries in any language or channel.

name: Alaffia Health
about:
Alaffia is the leading AI-powered payment integrity platform for health insurers, allowing them to efficiently detect and stop waste, fraud, and abuse through medical claim reviews.

Their proprietary algorithms can rapidly ingest thousands of pages of medical records and figure out what charges were appropriate and which weren’t. Leveraging the latest in LLM technologies, their platform enables workflows to be completely traceable and dynamic, allowing a reviewer to ask validating questions of the medical records themselves, and link back to the original source.  This innovation represents a massive step forward for payment integrity, allowing claims to be reviewed 20x faster than traditional workflows. And, because reviews can now be done more efficiently, lower dollar claims can be analyzed as well, bringing transparency to more of the market.

name: Ascend
about: Ascend is building financial infrastructure for insurance starting with premium financing & payments for commercial insurance.

name: Aspect
about:
Team: David Waltcher
Location: Bay Area / Distributed

Aspect is making Bazel adoptable, manageable, and effective with its developer platform that vastly speeds up builds and time to production while reducing build and CI costs.

name: Astronomer
about: Build, run, and observe data pipelines-as-code with Astro, the essential data orchestration platform powered by Apache Airflow™.

name: Authentic
about: Authentic is a turnkey insurance platform that allows SaaS companies, franchises, and other groups to launch their own captive insurance programs.

about: Demandbase helps marketing and sales teams overcome the disruptive data and technology fragmentation that inhibits insight and forces them to spam their prospects. It injects AI into every step of the buyer journey, wherever customer conversations happen, and helps orchestrate actions across systems and channels — through advertising, account-based experience, and sales motions. This allows GTM teams to spot opportunities earlier, engage with them more intelligently, and close deals faster.

name: Ezra Acquired by Function Health
about: The best way to beat cancer is to detect it early. Ezra offers MRI-based cancer screening that is fast, accurate, and affordable. Acquired by Function Health.

name: Firsthand
about:
AI isn’t just a new technology — it’s a new communication medium that enables brands to engage consumers directly, wherever they are. Firsthand unlocks this opportunity by making your expertise accessible in real time, guiding consumers toward the information they need to take action. Brand Agents act as AI-powered brand representatives, delivering your knowledge in real time and in the right context on your site, across paid media, and beyond.
‍
No one knows your products better than you. Now, AI makes it possible to turn that expertise into direct interactions with your audience. With the Firsthand Brand Agent Platform™, you stay in full control of your brand’s voice, knowledge, data, and relationships — using AI to connect, inform, and build trust in ways never before possible.

name: Fragment
about:
Team: Adam Nelson, David Waltcher
Location: New York, NY

FRAGMENT is a ledger API for building financial products. Compose any funds flow, turn it into code, embed it in your product and never get another balance wrong.

name: GoodDay
about:
GoodDay is on a mission to reinvent ERP by making powerful enterprise-grade operating tools accessible and easier to deploy for emerging brands.

Unlike traditional ERP systems that are complex, expensive, and hard to integrate, GoodDayOSTM is simple to set up, designed with modern, intuitive user interfaces, and developed from the ground up to help growing brands manage inventory well. The platform enables operators to open new sales channels and allocate inventory across virtual inventory locations and wholesale customers with confidence and a focus on margins and cash flow. GoodDayOSTM streamlines operations by eliminating manual spreadsheets and disconnected point solutions, empowering brands with accurate operating data to grow more efficiently.

name: Gravie
about: Gravie is reinventing health benefits, making them easier and more affordable for employers and employees. We’re one part smart tech, one part human touch.

name: Guru
about: Guru provides enterprise AI Search, Intranet, and Wiki in one platform. It lives in tools you already use, so there’s no need to context switch. Find info across any app, have an expert help if you can’t find it, and let Guru proactively identify knowledge gaps, duplicate knowledge, and translate it into 100+ languages.
